section.p: Coronavirus updates and resources Learn More

div.p: I'm attending the University of Virginia on a full ride, and I couldn't imagine getting here without Coney Island Prep.
I'm teaching more than music - I use an interdisciplinary approach while also teaching character.
As a parent, I love the open door policy. I can sit in a classroom to observe. Families are appreciated in so many ways!
I give to Coney Island Prep because they give life to the new narrative of what Brooklyn's kids are capable of. 100% college acceptance is just the beginning!
—Josh Wolfe / Chairman of the Board of Trustees, Coney Island Prep
College acceptance, three years in a row
Scholarship dollars earned by our graduates
More learning time than NYC Schools

section.aria-label: Learn more about jobs, enrollment and donations

a.aria-label: Learn more about a career with Coney Island Prep.
Get more information about how to enroll your child.

div.h2: Built in Brooklyn, we’ve grown to three campuses across Coney Island, Bath Beach, and Gravesend.

ul.aria-label: Quick stats for Coney Island Prep
Quick stats for Coney Island Prep Elementary School
Quick stats for Coney Island Prep Middle School
Quick stats for Coney Island Prep High School

div.p: At Coney Island Prep, I’ve been able to grow my craft as a teacher, and the professional development opportunities are built into the culture and routines of our school.
—Malaika DeJesus / 6th Grade Math Teacher, Coney Island Prep Middle School
I appreciated the apprentice teacher program for helping me to hone my skills with coaches both in my classroom and at grad school. I always received positively-framed, encouraging feedback!
—Calvin Lopez / Math Teacher, Coney Island Prep High School
I meet the needs of ALL scholars in my classroom, because every child deserves an excellent education.
—Charlotte Klass / Fourth Grade Teacher, Coney Island Prep Elementary School
